explains: adv. 不均衡地；不平坦地；不平行地

sentences.en: Do the spoils need to be so unevenly split?
sentences.cn: 战利品有必要被如此不均地分配吗？

sentences.en: Why are they so unevenly spread across the planet?
sentences.cn: 为什么它们在星球上分布得如此不均匀？

sentences.en: Though its overall effect may be positive, its costs and benefits are distributed unevenly.
sentences.cn: 虽然其总体效果可能是积极的，成本和收益却分配不均。
